body.name: Seventable Nightstand with Wireless Charging Station and LED Lights, Modern End Side Table with 3 Drawers and Open Compartment for Bedroom, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 15 hrs 54 mins
features: 【20 Colors RGB LED Lights】Seventable nightstand comes with multi-function RGB LED lights which has 20 dynamic colors, 21 dynamic modes, 8 levels of dynamic speed, and 8 levels of brightness adjustment. The light strip is controlled by remote control, it will create a fantastic ambiance in your bedroom in the dark.

【Intergrated Charging Station】This nightstand storage is arranged with wireless charger, 2 AC outlets, and 2 USB ports. One USB port of them is tied up with the led lights. It provides convenience for charging your phone, earphone, desk lamp, and other electrical appliances.

【Large Storage Space】This bedside night stand is designed with 3 sliding drawers. The drawers provide plenty of space for organizing small items. And the open compartment is convenient for daily use. Suitable for any room, such as a bedroom, dining room, or office playroom.

【Durable and Sturdy Material】This end table is made of particle board material that is safe and environmentally friendly. High quality waterproof surface treatment, easy to clean and maintain, durable. The top of the table can hold up to 44 pounds, and the drawer 11 pounds.
【Easy to Assemble】All parts and tools are included. Follow the installation instructions after receiving the product. It is estimated that it will take 30 minutes to complete the assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect night stand for small rooms.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Super cute and functional nightstand. The three drawers are fairly decent in size and hold a good amount of odds and ends like extra wires, chargers, glasses cases, little trinkets and such.Overall it was fairly easy to assemble. Not super tall but again next to my queen mattress, it is accessible when I need to get my phone or anything while lying down. The charging ports on top were a big selling point for me and I’m very happy with how they work. I have a Bluetooth desk lamp and Mr phone and wireless ear buds all connected and it’s very organized. The LED color backlight comes with s little remote snd it offers s nice mood light at night or the evening when needed.Overall really good value for the money. The night stand is practical with the outlets / USB charger station on top, had three decently sized drawers for those little odds and ends you have in your bedroom. Plus the LED lights and remote are a cool feature that make it standout a bit more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this nightstand!
reviews.reviewText: There’s ample storage space in the drawers. The shelf fits my cpap perfectly. The circular cut out in the back has plenty of room for my cpap hose and power cord. I love having all the space on the surface of the nightstand without my cpap taking up space. I enjoy the lights in the shelf. The charging dock on the nightstand works great and is so convenient. The only con that comes to mind is the assembly took nearly an hour. It’s sturdy, functional, and a great value for the price. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small, decent for the money
reviews.reviewText: It is small. The drawers are what feel really small. I had some small bottles I still had to tip over to fit inside the drawers. The quality is so so. The instructions were clear. The screwdriver that came with it is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as seen
reviews.reviewText: Its not difficult to assemble, took me 30mins- 1hr. It serves its purpose and i love the LED lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: You definitely get the quality for the price. It was a little high at first thought, but it’s everything you could need out of a nightstand. You could store a concealed weapon in it if need be, because it’s so sturdy! Drawers are quality slide and lock, pull up drawers. The wood is solid material. Only thing I’d say I didn’t like is how long the cords were, but you could plug it in from quite a distance if that’s your thing, lol. OVERALL: 9.0/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After looking for some time we decided to purchase this item and are really happy we did.Assembly was not bad at all. We love the 3 drawers and the size is perfect! Love the light feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent night stand
reviews.reviewText: The night stands are a little small. The picture of them makes them look or appear a tad bigger than they are however this is lack of looking at dimensions of the night stand. Overall not bad quality. Just very small*Update* I am here to edit this as I noticed after night one. The Wireless charger which was one of the key factors for buying these night stands does not charge. It will charge for a few minutes and then quit charging. I probably would not buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Product is a little shorter than expected but it’s still a cool nightstand for my 15 year old son.

Great night table ! Very clear instructions on putting it all together. This was my first time I put together a piece of furniture and for someone who never tempted this because I always saw this as a complete puzzle that overwhelmed me , seeing all this in pieces 😊 I succeeded 100% because of such detailed instructions . Sure it took me longer than someone who has a bit of experience. But my hubby said that it could be completed in roughly 1 hour with his experience of putting many items together but I wanted to give it a try all by myself . I needed a very small table for my limited space & small shallow drawers for reaching things easily without searching for an object in a too deep drawer in the dark . I also wanted an open space to put my iPad for easy charging and easy access without taking up drawer space and bending my wire in doing so . There is even space for a box of Kleenex beside my iPad . With the hole in the back to past all the wires , very practical. This table is the most beautiful with an extra , feature strip color lights with remote . So convenient to have usb ports & plug ins . What really was surprising for me was the wireless charging space . It works perfectly for my iPhone 13 Pro Max . Delivery was very fast . Also enough space to put a small lamp & alarm clock radio & my kindle e read & other small items . If you take your measurements perfectly then this table will match your needs. Sure the price might seem a little high but there are a lot of great features included to make life a little easier . Night tables among other furniture raised all their prices since pandemic & i looked up many places , either they were too expensive or didn’t suit what I needed or out of stock.
Awesome night stand! Love the colors of the light strip and how much space it has, fit perfectly. Wasn't hard to build either👍🏻
Very Nice Nightstand. A little darker than pictured but I prefer it. Wireless charger works amazing, LED lights nice touch.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product, but came up short.
reviews.reviewText: On the 6th photo of this product, it says the height is 25.2 inches, it is only 23.5 inches in reality. Again, great product. Just not as tall as advertised.
